thread.title: Bill Belichick (Patriots Coach) Snapface Press Conference Comment
thread.title_full: Bill Belichick (Patriots Coach) Snapface Press Conference Comment | Complex UK

author: Jose Martinez
title: Bill Belichick (Patriots Coach) Snapface Press Conference Comment
text:
New England Patriots head coach Bill Belichick is always a step ahead of the competition on the field. How he's able to do that is a topic for another day. However, during today's press conference, Belichick, in his best Buffalo Bill voice, may have accidentally struck gold in the world of social media when he asked a reporter if they were using the app "SnapFace."
Now, you're probably saying Belichick simply doesn't know the difference between Snapchat and Facebook . Or, maybe, the Patriots head coach has an app in the works that we're going to be hearing about down the road.
Okay... yeah. He's probably just confused.
In other "Belichick may actually be confused" news, when asked about Dallas Cowboys backup Brandon Weeden, Bill said, " He can make all the throws. I don’t think that’s an issue."
Go ahead and ask your nearest diehard Cowboys fan if Weeden "can make all the throws" and you tell us if Belichick is confused.

[via ESPN ]
